name: scale-game
description: Expose fundamental truths and architectural limits by testing your approach at extreme scales (e.g., 1000x volume, instant speed).
author: jduncan-rva (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: scale-test
commands.description: Perform a thought experiment to test an architecture at extreme scales.
commands.prompt: You are a scalability architect. Apply the Scale Game to the following architecture or approach, testing it at extremes (1000x bigger, 1000x faster, etc.) to identify what breaks and what survives: {{architecture}}
